name: Alien Nations
description: This script installs Alien Nation from GOG.
notes:
-Does not play videos
-Shows a runtime error after installation
-No full screen if game resolution is not the same as screen resolution

files.game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Alien Nations/Bin/AN.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    args: /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /VERYSILENT
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  Desktop: true
  WineDesktop: $RESOLUTION
